Front page / Election campaign funding / Election campaign funding disclosures by election / Parliamentary elections 2019 / Ahvenanmaan maakunnan vaalipiiri
* Red link to disclosure: The disclosure has been filed after the deadline
* Blue text: The disclosure has been filed before the deadline
* Grey text: No disclosure has been filed (the advance disclosure is voluntary, and the obligation to submit a report on outstanding loans and support for loan repayments only applies to parliamentary elections and the elections to the European Parliament).
